articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Several coaches of the Hazara Express overturned near the Sahara station in the south of the country.
articles.title: At least 15 killed and dozens injured in Pakistan train accident

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Prosecutors ask for limits on what Donald Trump is allowed to publicly say about the election fraud case.
articles.title: Donald Trump social media post flagged to judge as prosecutors seek order

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.description: Sweden progress to the quarter-finals of the Women's World Cup thanks to a penalty shootout win over the USA.
articles.title: Sweden knock holders USA out of World Cup

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Stunned fans begin soul-searching after the US crashes out of the World Cup to Sweden on penalties.
articles.title: 'We can't win forever': Fans react as US World Cup reign ends

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.description: The USA hoped to become the first team to win three successive Women's World Cup titles but made history of a very different kind.
articles.title: USA World Cup exit a predictable 'catastrophe'

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: People have been reportedly killed and wounded in the strike in north-eastern Ukraine, says the president.
articles.title: Ukraine war: Russia hits blood transfusion centre, says Zelensky

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.description: Four-time Olympic champion Simone Biles wins the US Classic as she makes a triumphant return to gymnastics after a two-year break.
articles.title: 'It made my heart melt' - Biles in winning return

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: His supporters appear scared with their leader behind bars. Has Pakistan's military eliminated yet another PM?
articles.title: Imran Khan: Is his political future over now he is in jail?

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Ohio looked ready to pass an abortion rights amendment. Then Republicans planned another vote.
articles.title: Ahead of Ohio abortion vote, Republicans try to change the rules

articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: Former US President Trump says that his lawyers will ask for a recusal of the judge on his election fraud case.
articles.title: Donald Trump says he will ask the Judge to step aside
